name: PokéTell
description:
Be the first in your neighborhood to add informative details about Gyms and Stops nearest you.

Use PokéTell to help others (and yourself) keep track of nearby Gyms and Stops. Beside mapping locations, you can also give details about nearby Gyms as well, such as its color, level, and details about its strongest occupier.

DISCLAIMER:
PokéTell is not affiliated, associated nor endorsed by the creators of Pokémon in any way.
